alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 5:15PM CDT until March 25 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing large hail up to ping pong ball size and damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located near New Brockton, or near Elba, and moving east at 35 mph. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fort Rucker around 530 PM CDT. Level Plains around 535 PM CDT. Daleville around 540 PM CDT. Ozark and Newton around 555 PM CDT. Pinckard around 600 PM CDT. Midland City around 605 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bells Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Dill, Hooper Stage Field, Knox Field, Napier Field, Mabson, Arguta and Snells Crossroads.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
